summary: The Probationary Reduction for Employee Protections Act (PREP Act) aims to reduce the probationary periods for federal employees. It amends Title 5 of the United States Code to shorten probationary periods for initial appointments in the competitive service, excepted service, and Senior Executive Service. The bill sets different probation lengths based on whether the employee previously held a civil service position in the executive branch and modifies provisions related to the Internal Revenue Service.
